data.name: variant
data.description: Defines the visual style of the inputs.

data.name: size
data.description: Defines the size of the inputs. Options typically include "sm", "md", and "lg".

data.name: floatingLabel
data.description: Enables or disables floating labels for inputs. If variant is set to "flat", this defaults to true and false otherwise.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the animation speed for inputs.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Controls the border radius of inputs.

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Allows custom CSS classes to be applied to input labels for additional styling.

data.name: reset
data.description: Resets all the defaults styles and apply only the custom styles.
